item.title: Traffic Collision and Avoidance System (TCAS) – Traffic Alert (TA) Display System(s) – RA Operative TA Inoperative

numlitem.para: RA visual display and audio functions are operative, and
En route or approach procedures do not require its use.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Operate TCAS in RA mode by selecting TCAS Mode Selector to TA/RA ONLY position.

placard.para: Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "TRAFFIC ALERT SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
